channel.title: How To Fix Client-Crashes In 64-Bit
channel.description:
Hello, recently i was having trouble with my client however i fixed it!
do you have this problem ??
My client code ------------------ @echo off Start javaw -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui exit ----------------------------------- where ever it says the second line, delete the start javaw and put "C:/Program Files (x86)/Java/Jre6/bin/java.exe" make sure the brackets are there!
have a nice day! :)
Reason why i posted this was i see this question asked alot.

item.title: How To Fix Client-Crashes In 64-Bit
item.dc:creator: @eanhl2005 eanhl2005
item.description:
@eanhl2005 wrote:

Hello, recently i was having trouble with my client however i fixed it!

do you have this problem ??

My client code

@echo off
Start javaw -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui
exit

where ever it says the second line, delete the start javaw and put “C:/Program Files (x86)/Java/Jre6/bin/java.exe” make sure the brackets are there!

have a nice day!

Reason why i posted this was i see this question asked alot.

Read full topic
